item.title: So I lost half of my Hololive oshi...
item.author: Linsaloty
item.content:encoded:
To those who reached out, thank you I appreciate it! Give your nearby Shiokko love if you see them at EXPO/Fes!
Also watching back I sound so sad haha. Don’t worry I am fine!(End of the day so my energy was drained!) As hard as it is, I’m genuinely happy for Shion that she was able to make the best choice herself. I do wish her the very best in whatever she pursues! Maybe we will get more Aqushio or Shioshachi if she ever decides to reincarnate!
Like everyone always says, treasure your time you have with your oshi cause you may never know when it will end!
Find me on X: https://twitter.com/linsaloty
▼Related Videos▼ Gomen Medicine MV: https://youtu.be/eKA6dewIdk8?si=OgIPcral-gVdf1zG Cinderella Magic MV: https://youtu.be/IdgsvGvm_Fc?si=dN06hyQEQ3Ejorws
Timestamps 0:00 - My oshi situations in 2024 4:00 - Shion 8:54 - Thoughts on Hololive/Cover 13:25 - My updated oshi rankings 16:59 - Final thoughts

item.title: Things to do around Hololive EXPO 2025
item.author: Linsaloty
item.content:encoded:
Find me on X: https://twitter.com/linsaloty BGM: "Sleeping World" by https://www.youtube.com/@KyattoWorks
▼Related Videos▼ Everything you need to know about Hololive Events Year End 2024: https://youtu.be/8Vi8lkLsYTI Visiting the Shiraken Collab Cafe: https://youtu.be/h-tl4G9TZKA Trying out Sakura Miko's Taiyaki (+collab overview): https://youtu.be/ma9HzFuQVe8 Hololive Goods Haul November 2024 ~ February 2025: https://youtu.be/3afyiJ9ydjY Where to buy Hololive goods in Akihabara: https://youtu.be/SHtfcx3qd-8 Visiting the Ayamy Family Collab Cafe: https://youtu.be/QXZfWabflEk Shiranui Flare MV Real Life Locations (Daikangensai! Yume no Flare Channel):https://youtu.be/ZODK9oxbGVY Visiting the Sakura Miko Collab Exhibition: https://youtu.be/qnoQF8L-Sxw Visiting the Hololive x HoneyWorks Exhibition at Tower Records (+collab overview): https://youtu.be/B590PR70wJY
Hololive goods unofficial site: https://merch-matome.com/goods-mar25/ Regloss cafe: https://www.sweets-paradise.jp/collaboration/regloss_cho_verybar Holotree event: https://tree-village.jp/news/014330.html Shiraken Haneda: https://shiraken-haneda.com/ Miko Taiyaki collab: https://brickonline.theshop.jp/ Crane games: https://charahiroba.com/prize/character/detail?id=893 Fandom Akiba: https://maps.app.goo.gl/7qWpPdkgk4M4BNa87 Hololive Tokyo Station store: https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/events/shoptyo/ Ayamy family cafe(info tba): https://x.com/ayamy_garubinu Hololive English Tokyo guide: https://hololivesuperexpo2025.hololivepro.com/special/holo-guide-tokyo
Timestamps: 0:00 - Intro 1:33 - ReGLOSS collab cafe 8:13 - Holotree collab 14:55 - Shiraken Haneda aiport collab 22:16 - Miko Taiyaki collab 25:24 - Crane games 27:47 - Fandom Akiba 29:11 - Hololive store Tokyo Station 30:35 - Ayamy Family cafe 32:41 - Hololive English Tokyo guide 38:41 - Final thoughts
